title: New Hearth & Hand by Magnolia Christmas Collection at Target – A Cozy Cottage Christmas!
description: Can you believe it’s already time to start thinking about Christmas? author: Jose Galvan
excerpt: Can you believe it’s already time to start thinking about Christmas? It is early and coming too fast, but It’s still one of my favorite times of the year, and I couldn’t be more excited about the new Hearth & Hand by Magnolia Christmas collection at Target. Every piece feels like it was made just […]
text: Can you believe it’s already time to start thinking about Christmas? It is early and coming too fast, but It’s still one of my favorite times of the year, and I couldn’t be more excited about the new Hearth & Hand by Magnolia Christmas collection at Target. Every piece feels like it was made just for cozying up our homes with that timeless, cottage charm we all adore. I’ve put together a curated list of my absolute must-haves from this collection to help you deck the halls and bring all the warmth and wonder of the season into your home!Here’s what I’m loving: 14″x20″ Christmas Plaid Lumbar Throw Pillow – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaThis cozy plaid lumbar pillow adds the perfect touch of Christmas cheer to any space. The warm colors and classic plaid pattern make it a versatile piece that pairs beautifully with any holiday decor. 18″x18″ Christmas Plaid Decorative Pillow Cover – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaI love swapping out pillow covers for the season, and this plaid one is perfect! It’s classic, cozy, and brings that farmhouse touch to your living room or bedroom effortlessly. Flameless Christmas Window Candle with Timer Brass – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaThis flameless candle is an absolute must-have! It brings a soft, warm glow to your windows, and with the timer feature, you can enjoy the magic of candlelight without the worry. Faux Cedar Drapery Christmas Garland – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaNothing says Christmas like lush greenery, and this faux cedar garland is perfect for draping across mantels, staircases, or even over doorways. It looks so real and instantly cozies up the space. Rustic Plaid Woven Christmas Stocking – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaThis rustic plaid stocking gives me all the nostalgic Christmas vibes! The woven texture and classic plaid make it feel so homey, and it’s the perfect stocking for filling with holiday goodies. Ticking Stripe Woven Christmas Stocking Green/Cream – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaIf you’re like me and love ticking stripe patterns, this stocking is going to be a favorite. The green and cream stripes add a subtle, vintage charm that’s perfect for any cozy cottage Christmas. 6′ Felt Ball Decorative Christmas Garland – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaThis felt ball garland is such a cute addition to your tree or mantel. I love how playful it is while still keeping that soft, cozy feel. It adds a touch of whimsy that’s perfect for the season. Letters To Santa Novelty Christmas Mailbox Dark Green – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaHow adorable is this Letters to Santa mailbox? It’s such a fun and festive way to add a little magic to your Christmas decor. I can’t wait to use it with my son to send off his wish list! Antique Brass Leaf Christmas Tree Ornaments (Set of 4) – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaThese antique brass leaf ornaments are stunning! They add a timeless elegance to the tree while still feeling warm and rustic. I love how they reflect the lights and bring that perfect farmhouse touch. 7′ Pre-Lit Faux Pine Christmas Tree Clear White Lights – Hearth & Hand™ with MagnoliaThis 7-foot pre-lit tree is perfect for creating that magical Christmas glow. The clear white lights are so classic, and the faux pine looks so real, you’d never guess it wasn’t freshly cut!I’m truly so excited to start planning, and this new Hearth & Hand Christmas collection makes it easy to create a space that feels warm, cozy, and festive. Let me know which pieces you’re adding to your home this year, and as always, thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!xxLizMarie
html:
Can you believe it’s already time to start thinking about Christmas? It is early and coming too fast, but It’s still one of my favorite times of the year, and I couldn’t be more excited about the new Hearth & Hand by Magnolia Christmas collection at Target. Every piece feels like it was made just for cozying up our homes with that timeless, cottage charm we all adore. I’ve put together a curated list of my absolute must-haves from this collection to help you deck the halls and bring all the warmth and wonder of the season into your home!

Here’s what I’m loving:

  • 14″x20″ Christmas Plaid Lumbar Throw Pillow – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    This cozy plaid lumbar pillow adds the perfect touch of Christmas cheer to any space. The warm colors and classic plaid pattern make it a versatile piece that pairs beautifully with any holiday decor.

  • 18″x18″ Christmas Plaid Decorative Pillow Cover – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    I love swapping out pillow covers for the season, and this plaid one is perfect! It’s classic, cozy, and brings that farmhouse touch to your living room or bedroom effortlessly.

  • Flameless Christmas Window Candle with Timer Brass – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    This flameless candle is an absolute must-have! It brings a soft, warm glow to your windows, and with the timer feature, you can enjoy the magic of candlelight without the worry.

  • Faux Cedar Drapery Christmas Garland – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    Nothing says Christmas like lush greenery, and this faux cedar garland is perfect for draping across mantels, staircases, or even over doorways. It looks so real and instantly cozies up the space.

  • Rustic Plaid Woven Christmas Stocking – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    This rustic plaid stocking gives me all the nostalgic Christmas vibes! The woven texture and classic plaid make it feel so homey, and it’s the perfect stocking for filling with holiday goodies.

  • Ticking Stripe Woven Christmas Stocking Green/Cream – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    If you’re like me and love ticking stripe patterns, this stocking is going to be a favorite. The green and cream stripes add a subtle, vintage charm that’s perfect for any cozy cottage Christmas.

  • 6′ Felt Ball Decorative Christmas Garland – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    This felt ball garland is such a cute addition to your tree or mantel. I love how playful it is while still keeping that soft, cozy feel. It adds a touch of whimsy that’s perfect for the season.

  • Letters To Santa Novelty Christmas Mailbox Dark Green – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    How adorable is this Letters to Santa mailbox? It’s such a fun and festive way to add a little magic to your Christmas decor. I can’t wait to use it with my son to send off his wish list!

  • Antique Brass Leaf Christmas Tree Ornaments (Set of 4) – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    These antique brass leaf ornaments are stunning! They add a timeless elegance to the tree while still feeling warm and rustic. I love how they reflect the lights and bring that perfect farmhouse touch.

  • 7′ Pre-Lit Faux Pine Christmas Tree Clear White Lights – Hearth & Hand™ with Magnolia
    This 7-foot pre-lit tree is perfect for creating that magical Christmas glow. The clear white lights are so classic, and the faux pine looks so real, you’d never guess it wasn’t freshly cut!

I’m truly so excited to start planning, and this new Hearth & Hand Christmas collection makes it easy to create a space that feels warm, cozy, and festive. Let me know which pieces you’re adding to your home this year, and as always, thank you so much for stopping by the blog; we truly appreciate it here on the farm. Keep up with us daily HERE!

xxLizMarie
